name: Digital Stoicism
description: Short, powerful wisdom from Stoic philosophers like Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus. Perfect for promoting focus, resilience, and a calm start to any task.
author: Alex Sparkes

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind â€” not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
quotes.author: Seneca
